GK19kragh_pu:310: kim apy ahiṃsyas tava cen mato 'haṃ yaśaḥśarīre bhava me dayāluḥ /

GK19kragh_pu:312: saṃbandham ābhāṣaṇapūrvam āhur vṛttaḥ sa nau saṃgatayor vanānte /

GK19kragh_pu:314: tatheti gām uktavate dilīpaḥ sadyaḥ pratiṣṭambhavimuktabāhuḥ /

GK19kragh_pu:316: tasmin kṣaṇe pālayituḥ prajānām utpaśyataḥ siṃhanipātam ugram /

GK19kragh_pu:320: taṃ vismitaṃ dhenur uvāca sādho māyāṃ mayodhbhāvya parīkṣito 'si /

GK19kragh_pu:325: vaṃśasya kartāram anantakīrtiṃ sudakṣiṇāyāṃ tanayaṃ yayāce // Ragh_2.64 //
GK19kragh_pu:326: saṃtānakāmāya tatheti kāmaṃ rājñe pratiśrutya payasvinī sā /

GK19kragh_pu:330: itthaṃ kṣitīśena vasiṣṭhadhenur vijñāpitā prītatarā babhūva /

GK19kragh_pu:338: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya hutaṃ hutāśam anantaraṃ bhartur arundhatīṃ ca /

GK19kragh_pu:341: yayāv anudghātasukhena mārgaṃ sveneva pūrṇena manorathena // Ragh_2.72 //

GK19kragh_pu:346: atha nayanasamutthaṃ jyotir atrer iva dyauḥ surasarid iva tejo vahniniṣṭhyūtam aiśam /

GK19kragh_pu:356: sthitālpatārāṃ karuṇendumaṇḍalāṃ vibhātakalpāṃ rajanīṃ vyaḍambayat // Ragh_3.2B //

GK19kragh_pu:363: upetya sā dohadaduḥkhaśīlatāṃ yad eva vavre tad apaśyad āhṛtam /

GK19kragh_pu:365: krameṇa nistīrya ca dohadavyathāṃ pracīyamānāvayavā rarāja sā /

GK19kragh_pu:375: kumārabhṛtyākuśalair anuṣṭhite bhiṣagbhir āptair atha garbhabharmaṇi /

GK19kragh_pu:381: ariṣṭaśayyāṃ parito visāriṇā sujanmanas tasya nijena tejasā /

GK19kragh_pu:392: na kevalaṃ sadmani māgadhīpateḥ pathi vyajṛmbhanta divaukasām api // Ragh_3.19 //

GK19kragh_pu:397: pituḥ prayatnāt sa samagrasaṃpadaḥ śubhaiḥ śarīrāvayavair dine dine /

GK19kragh_pu:429: niyujya taṃ homaturaṃgarakṣaṇe dhanurdharaṃ rājasutair anudrutam /

GK19kragh_pu:435: svedāmbunā mārjaya putra locane mamaiva yeneha turaṃgam īkṣase /

GK19kragh_pu:455: ato 'yam aśvaḥ kapilānukāriṇā pitus tvadīyasya mayāpahāritaḥ /

GK19kragh_pu:462: navāmbudānīkamuhūrtalāñchane dhanuṣy amoghaṃ samadhatta sāyakam // Ragh_3.53 //
GK19kragh_pu:465: papāv anāsvāditapūrvam āśugaḥ kutūhaleneva manuṣyaśoṇitam // Ragh_3.54 //
GK19kragh_pu:467: bhuje śacīpattraviśeṣakāṅkite svanāmacihnaṃ nicakhāna sāyakam // Ragh_3.55 //
GK19kragh_pu:468: jahāra cānyena mayūrapattriṇā śareṇa śakrasya mahāśanidhvajam /
GK19kragh_pu:469: cukopa tasmai sa bhṛśaṃ suraśriyaḥ prasahaya keśavyaparopaṇād iva // Ragh_3.56 //
GK19kragh_pu:471: babhūva yuddhaṃ tumuulaṃ jayaiṣiṇor adhomukhair ūrdhvamukhaiś ca pattribhiḥ // Ragh_3.57 //
GK19kragh_pu:473: śaśāka nirvāpayituṃ na vāsavaḥ svataś cyutaṃ vahnim ivādbhir ambudaḥ // Ragh_3.58 //
GK19kragh_pu:475: raghuḥ śaśāṅkārdhamukhena pattriṇā śarāsanajyām alunād viḍaujasaḥ // Ragh_3.59 //

GK19kragh_pu:590: nalikerāsavaṃ yodhāḥ śātravaṃ ca papur yaśaḥ // Ragh_4.42 //

GK19kragh_pu:608: te nipatya dadus tasmai yaśaḥ svam iva saṃcitam // Ragh_4.50 //

GK19kragh_pu:3155: saudhavāsam uṭajena vismṛtaḥ saṃcikāya phalaniḥspṛhas tapaḥ // Ragh_19.2 //
GK19kragh_pu:3156: labdhapālanavidhau na tatsutaḥ khedam āpa guruṇā hi medinī /
GK19kragh_pu:3157: bhoktum eva bhujanirjitadviṣā na prasādhayitum asya kalpitā // Ragh_19.3 //
GK19kragh_pu:3158: so 'dhikāram abhikaḥ kulocitaṃ kāścana svayam avartayat samāḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3159: taṃ niveśya saciveṣv ataḥ paraṃ strīvidheyanavayauvano 'bhavat // Ragh_19.4 //
GK19kragh_pu:3161: ṛddhimantam adhikarddhir uttaraḥ pūrvam utsavam apohad utsavaḥ // Ragh_19.5 //
GK19kragh_pu:3162: indriyārthapariśūnyam akṣarmaḥ soḍhum ekam api sa kṣaṇātaram /
GK19kragh_pu:3163: antare ca viharan divāniśaṃ na vyapaikṣata samutsukāḥ prajāḥ // Ragh_19.6 //
GK19kragh_pu:3164: gauravād yad api jātu mantriṇāṃ darśanaṃ prakṛtikāṅkṣitaṃ dadau /
GK19kragh_pu:3165: tad gavākṣavivarāvalambinā kevalena caraṇena kalpitam // Ragh_19.7 //
GK19kragh_pu:3169: gūḍhamohanagṛhās tadambubhiḥ sa vyagāhata vigāḍhamanmathaḥ // Ragh_19.9 //
GK19kragh_pu:3171: aṅganās tam adhikaṃ vyalobhayann arpitaprakṛtikāntibhir mukhaiḥ // Ragh_19.10 //
GK19kragh_pu:3173: abhyapadyata sa vāsitāsakhaḥ puṣpitāḥ kamalinīr iva dvipaḥ // Ragh_19.11 //
GK19kragh_pu:3174: sātirekamadakāraṇaṃ rahas tena dattam abhileṣur aṅganāḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3175: tābhir apy upahṛtaṃ mukhāsavaṃ so 'pibad bakulatulyadohadaḥ // Ragh_19.12 //
GK19kragh_pu:3176: aṅkam aṅkaparivartanocite tasya ninyatur aśūnyatām ubhe /
GK19kragh_pu:3177: vallakī ca hṛdayaṃgamasvanā valguvāg api ca vāmalocanā // Ragh_19.13 //
GK19kragh_pu:3178: sa svayaṃ prahatapuṣkaraḥ kṛtī lolamālyavalayo haran manaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3179: nartakīr abhinayātilaṅghinīḥ pārśvavartiṣu guruṣv alajjavat // Ragh_19.14 //
GK19kragh_pu:3180: cāru nṛtyavigame ca tanmukhaṃ svedabhinnatilakaṃ pariśramāt /
GK19kragh_pu:3183: vallabhābhir upasṛtya cakrire sāmibhuktaviṣayāḥ samāgamāḥ // Ragh_19.16 //
GK19kragh_pu:3185: mekhalābhir asakṛc ca bandhanaṃ vañcayan praṇayinīr avāpa saḥ // Ragh_19.17 //
GK19kragh_pu:3187: śuśruve priyajanasya kātaraṃ vipralambhapariśaṅkino vacaḥ // Ragh_19.18 //
GK19kragh_pu:3188: laulyam etya gṛhiṇīparigrahān nartakīṣv asulabhāsu tadvapuḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3189: vartate sma sa kathaṃcid ālikhann aṅgulīkṣaraṇasannavartikaḥ // Ragh_19.19 //
GK19kragh_pu:3191: ninyur utsavavidhicchalena taṃ devya ujjitaruṣaḥ kṛtārthatām // Ragh_19.20 //
GK19kragh_pu:3193: prāñjaliḥ praṇayinīḥ prasādayan so 'dunot praṇayamantharaḥ punaḥ // Ragh_19.21 //
GK19kragh_pu:3198: nāma vallabhajanasya te mayā prāpya bhāgyam api tasya kāṅkṣyate /
GK19kragh_pu:3199: lolupaṃ bata mano mameti taṃ gotraviskhalitam ūcur aṅganāḥ // Ragh_19.24 //
GK19kragh_pu:3201: utthitasya śayanaṃ vilāsinas tasya vibhramartatāny apāvṛṇot // Ragh_19.25 //
GK19kragh_pu:3202: sa svayaṃ caraṇarāgam ādadhe yoṣitaṃ na ca tathā samāhitaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3205: vighniteccham api tasya sarvato manmathendhanam abhūd vadhūratam // Ragh_19.27 //
GK19kragh_pu:3207: chāyayā smitamanojñayā vadhūr hrīnimīlitamukhīś cakāra saḥ // Ragh_19.28 //
GK19kragh_pu:3209: prārthayanta śayanotthitaṃ priyās taṃ niśātyayavisargacumbanam // Ragh_19.29 //
GK19kragh_pu:3211: pipriye sa na tathā yathā yuvā vyaktalakṣma paribhogamaṇḍanam // Ragh_19.30 //
GK19kragh_pu:3212: mitrakṛtyam apadiśya pārśvataḥ prasthitaṃ tam anavasthitaṃ priyāḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3213: vidma he śaṭha palāyanacchalāny añjaseti rurudhuḥ kacagrahaiḥ // Ragh_19.31 //
GK19kragh_pu:3217: saṃgamāya niśi gūḍhacāriṇaṃ cāradūtikathitaṃ puro gatāḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3218: vañcayiṣyasi kutas tamovṛtaḥ kāmuketi cakṛṣus tam aṅganāḥ // Ragh_19.33 //
GK19kragh_pu:3219: yoṣitām uḍupater ivāciṣāṃ sparśanirvṛtim asāv anāpnuvan /
GK19kragh_pu:3222: śilapakārya ubhayena vejitās taṃ vijihmanayanā vyalobhayan // Ragh_19.35 //
GK19kragh_pu:3223: aṅgasattvavacanāśrayaṃ mithaḥ strīṣu nṛtyam upadhāya darśayan /
GK19kragh_pu:3224: sa prayoganipuṇaiḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ saṃjagharṣa saha mitrasaṃnidhau // Ragh_19.36 //
GK19kragh_pu:3226: prāvṛṣi pramadabarhiṇeṣv abhūt kṛtimādriṣu vihāravibhramaḥ // Ragh_19.37 //
GK19kragh_pu:3227: vigrahāc ca śayane parāṅmukhīr nānunetum abalāḥ sa tatvare /
GK19kragh_pu:3228: ācakāṅkṣa ghanaśabdaviklavās tā vivṛtya viśatīr bhujāntaram // Ragh_19.38 //
GK19kragh_pu:3230: anvabhuṅkta surataśramāpahāṃ meghamuktaviśadāṃ sa candrikām // Ragh_19.39 //
GK19kragh_pu:3231: saikataṃ ca sarayūṃ vivṛṇvatīṃ śroṇibimbam iva haṃsamekhalam /
GK19kragh_pu:3234: jahrur āgrathanamokṣalolupaṃ haimanair nivsanaiḥ sumadhyamāḥ // Ragh_19.41 //
GK19kragh_pu:3236: tasya sarvasuratāntarakṣamāḥ sākṣitāṃ śiśirarātrayo yayuḥ // Ragh_19.42 //
GK19kragh_pu:3237: dakṣiṇena pavanena saṃbhṛtaṃ prekṣya cūtakusumaṃ sapallavam /
GK19kragh_pu:3238: anvanaiṣur avadhūtavigrahās taṃ durutsahaviyogam aṅganāḥ // Ragh_19.43 //
GK19kragh_pu:3239: tāḥ svam aṅkam adhiropya dolayā preṅkhayan parijanāpaviddhayā /
GK19kragh_pu:3240: muktarajju nibiḍaṃ bhayacchalāt kaṇṭhabandhanam avāpa bāhubhiḥ // Ragh_19.44 //
GK19kragh_pu:3243: yat sa bhagnasahakāram āsavaṃ raktapāṭalasamāgamaṃ papau /
GK19kragh_pu:3244: tena tasya madhunirgamāt kṛśaś cittayonir abhavat punarnavaḥ // Ragh_19.46 //
GK19kragh_pu:3245: evam indriyasukhāni nirviśann anyakāryavimukhaḥ sa pārthivaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3247: taṃ pramattam api na prabhāvataḥ śekur ākramitum anyapārthivāḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3248: āmayas tu ratirāgasaṃbhavo dakṣaśāpa iva candram akṣiṇot // Ragh_19.48 //
GK19kragh_pu:3249: dṛṣṭadoṣam api tan na so 'tyajat saṅgavastu bhiṣajām anāśravaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3250: svādubhis tu viṣayair hṛtas tato duḥkham indriyagaṇo nivāryate // Ragh_19.49 //
GK19kragh_pu:3252: yakṣmaṇāpi parihānir āyayau kāmayānasamavasthayā tulām // Ragh_19.50 //
GK19kragh_pu:3253: vyoma paścimakalāsthitendu vā paṅkaśeṣam iva gharmapalvalam /
GK19kragh_pu:3254: rājñi tatkulam abhūt kṣayāture vāmanārcir iva dīpabhājanam // Ragh_19.51 //
GK19kragh_pu:3255: bāḍham eṣu divaseṣu karma sādhayati putrajanmane /
GK19kragh_pu:3256: ity adarśitarujo 'sya mantriṇaḥ śaśvad ūcur aghaśaṅkinīḥ prajāḥ // Ragh_19.52 //
GK19kragh_pu:3257: sa tv anekavanitāsakho 'pi san pāvanīm anavalokya saṃtatim /
GK19kragh_pu:3258: vaidyayatnaparibhāvinaṃ gadaṃ na pradīpa iva vāyum atyagāt // Ragh_19.53 //
GK19kragh_pu:3259: taṃ gṛhopavana eva saṃgatāḥ paścimakratuvidā purodhasā /
GK19kragh_pu:3260: rogaśāntim apadiśya mantriṇaḥ saṃbhṛte śikhini gūḍham ādadhuḥ // Ragh_19.54 //
GK19kragh_pu:3264: nirvāpitaḥ kanakakumbhamukhojjhitena vaṃśābhiṣekavidhinā śiśireṇa garbhaḥ // Ragh_19.56 //
GK19kragh_pu:3265: taṃ bhāvāya prasavasamayākāṅkṣiṇīnāṃ prajānām antargūḍhaṃ kṣitir iva babhau bījamuṣṭiṃ dadhānā /
GK19kragh_pu:3266: maulaiḥ sārdhaṃ sthavirasacivair hemasiṃhāsanasthā rājñī rājyaṃ vidhivad aśiṣad bhartur avyāhatājñā // Ragh_19.57 //
GK19kragh_pu:3270: imāṃ devīm ṛtusnātāṃ smṛtvā sapadi satvaraḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3274: gāndharvam astraṃ tad itaḥ pratīccha prayogasaṃhāravibhaktamantram /
GK19kragh_pu:3275: saṃdhyā prātipadeneva na cārihiṃsā vijayaḥ svahaste // Ragh_5.57* //
GK19kragh_pu:3276: nidrāvaśaṃ tvayi gate śaśinā kathaṃcid ātmānam ānanarucā bhavato viyujya /
GK19kragh_pu:3277: lakṣmīr vibhātasamaye 'pi hi darśanena paryutsukā praṇayinī niśi khaṇḍiteva // Ragh_5.67* //
GK19kragh_pu:3278: mandaṃ vivāti himasaṃbhṛtaśītabhāvaḥ saṃsṛjyate sarasijair aruṇāṃśubhinnaiḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3279: saurabhyam īpsur iva te mukhamārutasya yan no guṇān prati niśāpariṇāmavāyuḥ // Ragh_5.69* //
GK19kragh_pu:3280: iti sa vihatanidras talpam alpetarāṃśaḥ suragaja iva gaṅgāsaikataṃ supratīkaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3281: parijanavanitānāṃ pādayor vyāpṛtānāṃ valayamaṇividiṣṭaṃ pracchadāntaṃ mumoca // Ragh_5.75* //
GK19kragh_pu:3283: siṃhāsanasthān nṛpatīn apaśyat yūpān praśastān iva haimavedīn // Ragh_6.1* //
GK19kragh_pu:3284: yadā yadā rājakumārikāsau na pūrvapūrvaṃ ganayāṃ cakāra /
GK19kragh_pu:3285: tadā tadā nāmitarepharekhām āśālatā pallavinī babhūva // Ragh_6.67* //
GK19kragh_pu:3287: ātastare bhallanikṛttakaṇṭhair huṃkāragarbhair dviṣatāṃ śirobhiḥ // Ragh_7.38* //
GK19kragh_pu:3288: atha vīkṣya guṇaiḥ pratiṣṭhitaṃ prakṛtiṣv ātmajam ābhigamikaiḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3289: padavīṃ pariṇāmadeśinīṃ raghur ādatta vanāntagāminīm // Ragh_8.9* //
GK19kragh_pu:3291: prāk sṛṣṭe[ḥ] kevalātmane paścād bhad[r]am upeyuṣe // Ragh_10.19* //
GK19kragh_pu:3293: svāṃ sakṣiptatikarkaśaṃ hi tac cikṣipur daśāarathātmajāgrataḥ // Ragh_11.43* //
GK19kragh_pu:3294: nistriṃśakalpasya nidher jalānām eṣā tamāladrumarāja nīlā /
GK19kragh_pu:3295: dūrād arālabhru vibhāti velā kalaṅkarekhā malineva dhārā // Ragh_13.15* //
GK19kragh_pu:3296: pratyāgatau tatra cirapravāsād apaśyatāṃ dāśarathī jananyau /
GK19kragh_pu:3298: keyaṃ vane lakṣmaṇa lakṣmaṇeti dīnākṣaraṃ roditi yoṣid uccaiḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3299: āṃ jñātam eṣā janakātmajeti kavir vicintyāntikam ājagāma // Ragh_14.69* //
GK19kragh_pu:3300: tad ākarṇya muner vākyaṃ rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3302: gaccha lakṣmaṇa śīghraṃ tvaṃ mā bhūd dharmaviparyayaḥ /
GK19kragh_pu:3303: tyāgo vāpi vadho vāpi sādhūnām ubhayaṃ samam // Ragh_15.94* //
GK19kragh_pu:3305: kundāgra danto ripudantisiṃhaḥ patiḥ pṛthivyāḥ kulakair ivenduḥ // Ragh_18.16* //
GK19kragh_pu:3306: hitvātha bhogāṃs tapasottamena triviṣṭapaṃ prāptavati kṣitīśe /
GK19kragh_pu:3307: tadātmajaḥ sāgaradhīracetāḥ śaśāsa pṛthvīṃ sakalāṃ nṛsomaḥ // Ragh_18.19* //
